Flu Vaccination Registration


With flu season around the corner, we’re providing flu vaccines at our offices to help keep you protected. To ensure a smooth process, please register and select your preferred location. The deadline for registration is October 31st.

- Tuesday, November 5 at D3
- Wednesday, November 6 at HO1

While these vaccinations are available for team members only and fully covered by the Group, we've also arranged for your family members to receive their flu shot at Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib Hospital.

CHALHOUB 30X30 IS BACK!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/bjG9_QCWyUmi0D4X2bPe5Q/550535/9A2BBE39D42EF3A9AE9F7064B285D9B1/30x30-banner.png> 	
We are a few days away from Chalhoub 30x30 Challenge. This year, we are launching a STEP CHALLENGE for all of our teams (office, stores, warehouse) in all countries.

Our mission is to complete the highest number of steps as ONE TEAM. Whether you prefer to go for a nice walk, quick run, or even a hike, it's all about getting active and feeling great.

WELCOMING NIKOLA GLASNOVIC TO THE GROUP

Nikola joins our Group as Senior Manager in Information Security, reporting directly to Dee Deu.

In his role, he will focus on GRC domains. His efforts will help strengthen the Group’s overall security posture by ensuring adherence to industry standards, enhancing governance across security initiatives, and integrating risk management into operations. 

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.onechalhoub.com%252fNews%252f59335%252fwelcoming-nikola-glasnovic-to-the-group%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWVVQRNLJ2brDQtweIeZk4VT0u3hfbYEJddmIRnx64HswZ0CcnWZuYsfAQHv3fEllJ%252fSyjGMju9KHfsNe%252bmq%252foTrnxSbbTgXCuOcDcx5KAs9lHPD%252bXc9rBuAG5vxSUTerQCi0ag5YQbkvPCNw6GLs2BPW4TKO74oTr07H2BrVMV7nqZJFsIZTzmYPMSS1VVSafP76smhxwZ8RSf7Us2EaQ3ncSKmNGrs1Xfj0qAfvBqv%252f&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C6e0b1311ef8245021dab08dcf3392736%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638652674051980221%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=UGnJOuTx3Da92IltHk13NE27RSI%2FGimQEW1q%2BAKo%2BZA%3D&reserved=0>

Last week, team members from different verticals and departments gathered over coffee with Michael Chalhoub. During this open hour, they had the opportunity to ask questions, engaged in meaningful conversations and share experiences. Stay tuned for future opportunities to meet and chat with our leaders!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/bjG9_QCWyUmi0D4X2bPe5Q/550542/FE79E3137E8B82A764825326D136D10E/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-20.gif>

LEAN SIX SIGMA CERTIFICATION

Over the past three months, 56 team members were certified in Green Belt Six Sigma sessions and 8 in Black Belt Six Sigma sessions across our RSO, 3D, Tech & Data, and Supply Chain teams. This training enhanced our team members problem-solving abilities, driving operational excellence, and fostering continuous improvement.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/bjG9_QCWyUmi0D4X2bPe5Q/550540/17ED3DA421CCFE162A9FC8B185F36254/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-6.png>
